\def\InsertUnit#1{\ifx#1\@empty\relax\else\textbf{(\si{#1})}\fi}

% \def\InsertLeg#1{\csname InsertLeg#1\endcsname}
\def\InsertLeg#1{\csname InsertLeg#1\endcsname}
\def\InsertLegC{\csname C@\cmdSF@leg@C\endcsname}
\def\InsertLegT{\csname T@\cmdSF@leg@T\endcsname}
\def\InsertLegk{\csname k@\cmdSF@leg@k\endcsname}
\def\InsertLegAf{\csname Af@\cmdSF@leg@Af\endcsname\,\,}

\def\InsertTime#1{$\SI{#1}{kyr}$\,\,}
\def\InsertLegt{\CallIfNotEmpty{\InsertTime}{\cmdSF@leg@t}}

\def\InsertAcc#1{$\Ms=\SI{#1}{cm~yr^{-1}}$\,\,}
\def\InsertLegA{\CallIfNotEmpty{\InsertAcc}{\cmdSF@leg@A}}

\def\InsertBml#1{$\Mb=\SI{#1}{mm~yr^{-1}}$\,\,}
\def\InsertLegB{\CallIfNotEmpty{\InsertBml}{\cmdSF@leg@B}}

\def\InsertAp#1{$\PerH:\PerL=\mathsf{{\csname Ap@#1\endcsname}}$\,\,}
\def\InsertLegAp{\CallIfNotEmpty{\InsertAp}{\cmdSF@leg@Ap}}


\expandafter\def\csname P@vii100\endcsname{100}

\expandafter\def\csname P@vii25\endcsname{25}

\def\InsertPfx#1{$\Delta t=\SI{\csname P@#1\endcsname}{yr}$}
\def\InsertLegP{\CallIfNotEmpty{\InsertPfx}{\cmdSF@leg@P}}

\def\Insert@C#1{{\Huge\sffamily\bfseries%
    \csname Pfx@\cmdSF@coor@pt\endcsname%
    \csname Var@\cmdSF@coor@lt\endcsname%
    $\InsertUnit{\cmdSF@coor@ut}$%
  }}
\newcommand{\ParseText}[1][]{%
   \InsertLeg{k}%
   \InsertLeg{C}\InsertLeg{T}\InsertLeg{P}%
   \InsertLeg{A}\InsertLeg{Af}\InsertLeg{Ap}\InsertLeg{B}\InsertLeg{t}%
}

\def\Insert@L#1{%
 {\tikz \draw node[anchor=mid,fill=white,inner sep=0pt]
   {\large\sffamily\bfseries \ParseText};
 }}

\def\Insert@G#1{%
 {\tikz \draw node[anchor=mid,fill=white,inner sep=0pt]
   {\Large\sffamily\bfseries \ParseText};
 }}
